menu_items.name: Bread omlet
menu_items.description: 3 desi eggs whisked firmly with organic herbs from himalayas and hand made mixed salt + veggies served with whole wheat bread

menu_items.name: Aalu paratha
menu_items.description: A spicy paratha with potato masal stuffing, fried in camel's milk ghee and served with pudina, tamatar and coconut chutney

menu_items.name: Kellogs' muesli
menu_items.description: This is specially for urban nibbis who want to post status' having oat meat and  feeling fit with mai and 69 others

menu_items.name: Maggi Maggi Maggi
menu_items.description: A highly controversial dish made with special ingredients like water and in packed masala which takes immense time and efforts

menu_items.name: Chensu
menu_items.description: A grainy dish made out of grinded lentils, then fried in desi ghee - A garhwali savoury

menu_items.name: Moong dal (bimar)
menu_items.description: An overcooked gooey non-newtonian slime fluid made out moong dal...moong dal tates like heaven with alcohol but when you are sick....

menu_items.name: GB road ki rabdi
menu_items.description: A sweet(katai meetha) dish made out of dry rasgulla soaked in almond cardamom condensed milk

menu_items.name: mutton-e-DATA
menu_items.description: This dish is a kind contribution of a NITUK alumni during the night before his DSA exam.................what is data?

menu_items.name: Aunty ke momo
menu_items.description: A chef once was inpired by the song - 'bol na aunty aaun kya' and then this dish was born.

menu_items.name: Dal makhkhi
menu_items.description: A buttery letil dish, cooked over slow flame for 3 hours, with north indian spices and garnish with fresh trapped house flies

menu_items.name: Nepali pizza
menu_items.description: A moti roti with layered with desi camel's ghee and fileld with goat cheeze in each layer, topeed with veggies of nepal

menu_items.name: Mess ka zeher
menu_items.description: When every dish in the menu is filled with love of mess wrokers,then plan pops otta nowhere to go to tapri

menu_items.name: Feeki chai
menu_items.description: A freshning cup of darjeeling tea with a slice of lemon and discreet choice of sugar

menu_items.name: Nariyal pani
menu_items.description: A virgin sip of coconut water can boost you for the whole day. Freshly transported narirals from coasts of Kerela

menu_items.name: Bournvita
menu_items.description: If you are visiting the Tapri with you kids, then if sure will attract them

menu_items.name: Dabur shilajit gold
menu_items.description: Agar aap din bhar ke shram ke baad thake thake mehsoos krte ho, to so jao bhsdiwalo. Ye mat lena
